If you don\'t permit the storage access but want to use the function at a later time, you can grant the permission later. Please open then: systemsettings - apps - weather. In the permissions section you can grant the \"write storage permission\". You must grant \"Write settings\" to change sounds like the default ringtone. Please search in the next window for \"Blue Minimal\" and grant the permission. Hex Code Format incorrect // Help Click on a list entry to hear a five seconds preview of the sound. By long pressing you can open a menu. There you can set the sound as ringtone, notification or alarm. You can also hear the whole track. If you set an alarm tone, the tone will be copied in the \"alarms folder\" on your sd-card. You must reboot your device an choose the wanted alarm tone in the alarm settings. Here you can set a wallpaper. You can also set a color as wallpaper. Just click the menu entry. Here you can create a ZIP-file with informations, concerning app icons you want to be themed. Send the created ZIP-file to the developer of your theme.
